title: Chuunibyou

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use an ability of any role with flavour text.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you use the ability of a role, the host will give you one to five Crimson Ephemeral Incantations depending on how cool and edgy the flavour is, with something super fucking awesome like 1834: Apophis's being five and something purely intended to be funny like 147: Word Bomber's being one.
- You may only use an ability from each role once.
- You have two Basic autovests.

desc:
Post 2462
*Reality be rent... Synapse break.... Banishment this world!!*
